name: Aboard the Express to Nowhere
description:
This is an RPG with turn-based combat developed within the Unity Engine. 

Darren Curtis music utilized for the battle theme

Lobo Loco - "After a Dreamy Night" used for main level theme

JFXR used for sound effects

Take up the role of a detective who has mysteriously ended up on a train with no idea where they are. Manage to run into enemies from your past and figure out more about this mysterious train.
